DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis different concentration nucleotide ' supplementation infant formula might affect differently growth and/or clinical parameter neonate .
DOC.detailed_description: Three group 50 newborn infant , feed 30 day infant formula supplement either 4.9 mg/100 kcal 10.6 mg/100 kcal nucleotide supplementation . Newborns monitor prospectively follow outcome parameter : - Growth percentile . - Behaviour infantile colic . - Bowel habit . - Side effect .
